title: Asset Building through Credit Pilot: Building a Sustainable Business Model
summary: The Building a Sustainable Business Model report summarizes the approach and tools used in the process of developing a business model that helped participants of the Asset Building through Credit Pilot continue to offer a secured credit card teamed with credit coaching. The report focuses on business models because they can help nonprofits clearly articulate a rationale for further investments in an environment of competitive funding.
tag-1: Asset Building through Credit Pilot: Building a Sustainable Business Model
